item.title: CVE-2021-39311|2024-09-17T03:33:16.732Z -- link-list-manager -- link-list-manager
item.description: The link-list-manager WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the category parameter found in the ~/llm.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
